body: Yujiro Hanma tip: Don't stick your horny in monsters if you aren't strong enough.
I just realized, the title is not as in "a slave who's a slime", but as in "a slave for the slimes". It seems obvious but I didn't really stop to think about what the title might mean.
Be careful what you wish for I guess.
Poor guy all he want is to live with slimes

-as an animal or a person. After that let the fun begin 😉. But make the story more lighter, not dark as Fk like a nightmare. Just do it like you did in the other comics (My boyish girlfriend) it was my favorite!🤤🤭😏👉👌

If make another one of these it will be a success!, like the other series you make (like my boyish girlfriend). Let me explain😁 make another one this but a sequel, after the incident slime killing humans then the slimes will be forbidden strictly, and there will be a lot of extermination of slimes. Slimes will be feared by humans and call an exterminator quick as possible (because of news and media saying "slimes are dangerous, because there had been a lot of incidents of people eaten by slimes", something like that😁). That's the start of the story, and the protagonist will be younger a highschool dude. The. He encountered a slime but, there something different about the slime ( the slime just evolve or a adapted, changes it appearances more humanoid figure of a female, and more smarter. It can think more of danger, trust, feelings😏👉👌, hide, scared, shy and etc. ) and the slime was hiding from exterminator, the he take the slime home. He knows the risk, but he thinks of the slime
